test.name: Cenario: Alterar senha inicial do usuário

kw.name: Open Connection
kw.doc: Create a connection with IBM3270 mainframe with the default port 23. To make a connection with the mainframe you only must inform the Host. You can pass the Logical Unit Name and the Port as optional.

kw.name: Change Wait Time
kw.doc: To give time for the mainframe screen to be "drawn" and receive the next commands, a "wait time" has been created, which by default is set to 0.5 seconds. This is a sleep applied AFTER the follow keywords:

kw.name: Change Wait Time After Write
kw.doc: To give the user time to see what is happening inside the mainframe, a "change wait time after write" has been created, which by default is set to 0 seconds. This is a sleep applied AFTER the string sent in this keywords:

kw.name: Set Screenshot Folder
kw.doc: Set a folder to keep the html files generated by the `Take Screenshot` keyword.

kw.name: Wait Until String
kw.doc: Wait until a string exists on the mainframe screen to perform the next step. If the string not appear on 5 seconds the keyword will raise a exception. You can define a different timeout.

kw.name: Get Value From User
kw.doc: Pauses execution and asks user to input a value.

kw.name: Get Value From User
kw.doc: Pauses execution and asks user to input a value.

kw.name: Write Bare In Position
kw.doc: Send only the string to the screen at screen co-ordinates "ypos"/"xpos".

kw.name: Move Next Field
kw.doc: Move the cursor to the next input field. Equivalent to pressing the Tab key.

kw.name: Write Bare
kw.doc: Send only the string to the screen at the current cursor location.

kw.name: Send Enter
kw.doc: Send a Enter to the screen.

kw.name: Entao devo realizar a alteração da senha
Wait Until String
kw.msg: String "Sign-on Information" not found in 5 seconds
kw.doc: Wait until a string exists on the mainframe screen to perform the next step. If the string not appear on 5 seconds the keyword will raise a exception. You can define a different timeout.
kw.status: String "Sign-on Information" not found in 5 seconds

kw.name: Send Enter
kw.doc: Send a Enter to the screen.

kw.status: String "Sign-on Information" not found in 5 seconds

kw.name: Close Mainframe
Take Screenshot
kw.msg: CommandError: Syntax error: ")" or "," expected at column 46
kw.doc: Generate a screenshot of the IBM 3270 Mainframe in a html format. The default folder is the log folder of RobotFramework, if you want change see the `Set Screenshot Folder`.
